how many is to many:)



----- Original Message ----
From: Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, March 20, 2008 6:53:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Happy Easter

Yeah, Happy Easter to y'all!

And don't eat too many chocolate bunnies! :-))

-- 

> Happy Easter ALL!!
> Easter should be a celebration that ALL people - theists, atheists, 
> believers, materialists, scientists, religionists - everyone - will be 
> resurrected immediately after physical death - guaranteed! 

> And that's good news for all honest, decent and open-minded people on 
> Earth.

> LK
